opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: City of Rancho Palos Verdes, California v. Abrams

opinion:
543 U.S. 1033

CITY OF RANCHO PALOS VERDES, CALIFORNIA, ET AL.
v.
ABRAMS.

No. 03-1601.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 13, 2004.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 542 U. S. 965.] Motion of petitioners to dispense with printing the joint appendix granted. Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
